name: A primitive clay idol
data: It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'creeping doom'.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'earth lore'.
